name: System Break (PitzonXD, LoreneCollin, LaetitiaGERARD, Ashgan)
description:
System Break is an arcade game where players must defeat a series of bosses to seal the rift between the digital and physical worlds in action-packed side-scrolling and top-down sections.

Bear in mind that this is still an unfinished prototype. There are currently no game sounds and some content is still missing.

This game was developed as part of a graded project within the BTS Game Programming & Game Design at the Lycée des Arts et Métiers in Luxembourg by a group of four students:

  • Laetitia Gérard (Art)
  • Kevin Fayard (Game Design)
  • Lorène Collin (Art)
  • Ben Pitzmann (Programming)
